accessibility.title: Accessibility Settings
accessibility.intro: Personalize your experience with features designed to make our app more accessible and comfortable to use. All settings are saved automatically and will persist across sessions.
accessibility.largeTextModeDesc: Increase font size throughout the app for better readability.
accessibility.simplifiedNavigationDesc: Switch to a simplified layout with fewer options and larger buttons.
accessibility.voiceControlDesc: Enable and customize voice commands for common actions like ordering.
accessibility.highContrastDesc: Enhance color contrast for improved visibility.
accessibility.screenReaderDesc: Enable advanced screen reader support with proper labels.
accessibility.assistiveTouchDesc: Remap or customize touch gestures for motor impairments.
accessibility.colorBlindModeDesc: Adjust the color scheme for various forms of color blindness.
accessibility.reducedMotionDesc: Disable animations and transitions for motion sensitivity.
accessibility.iconOnlyModeDesc: Display information primarily through universally recognized icons.
accessibility.audioAssistanceDesc: Enable audio descriptions for screen elements and instructions.
accessibility.pictorialMenuDesc: Display restaurant menus with larger, clearer images of dishes.
accessibility.voiceInputDesc: Enhanced voice-based interaction for search and common actions.
accessibility.textSizeDesc: Adjust the base font size for better readability
accessibility.textSpacingDesc: Increase spacing between lines, words, and paragraphs
accessibility.readableFontDesc: Use a more readable font designed for people with dyslexia
accessibility.linkHighlightDesc: Underline all clickable links for better identification
accessibility.focusIndicatorDesc: Show prominent focus indicators for keyboard navigation
accessibility.colorVisionDesc: Optimize colors for different types of color vision
accessibility.keyboardNavDesc: Use Tab to navigate, Enter to select, and Escape to close dialogs
accessibility.screenReaderSupportDesc: This app is optimized for screen readers like VoiceOver and TalkBack
accessibility.wcagDesc: We follow Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 Level AA
accessibility.resetConfirm: ⚠️ This will reset all accessibility settings to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
